meanings.sent1: The artist produced a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced many toys for the children.
meanings.sent3: The magician produced a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: Her speech produced a wave of emotions in the audience.
meanings.sent5: The chef produced a masterpiece dish that amazed everyone.

meanings.sent1: The apple tree produced a bountiful harvest this year.
meanings.sent2: The farm produced fresh vegetables for the market.
meanings.sent3: The hen produced an egg every morning like clockwork.
meanings.sent4: His hard work produced great results in the end.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower produced seeds that attracted many birds.

meanings.sent1: The company produced high-quality cars for its customers.
meanings.sent2: The bakery produced delicious pastries every day.
meanings.sent3: The carpenter produced a beautiful table from scratch.
meanings.sent4: The artist produced intricate designs on the pottery.
meanings.sent5: The factory produced goods for export to other countries.

meanings.definition: To cause to happen; bring about.
meanings.sent1: His actions produced a positive change in the community.
meanings.sent2: The storm produced strong winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke produced laughter from the audience.
meanings.sent5: Her words produced a sense of calm in the room.
